annonstext:
We are growing – do you want to grow with us? Our Data Analytics business is the market leader for data analytical solutions within the life science industry. We are on a strong growth path, driving new innovative solutions in this field and therefore we are looking for a new member of our team to support and grow the sales in Europe to the life science and process industry.

Can you say yes to the following? ... then let’s talk!:

	Comfortable in providing disruptive resolutions to customers
	Eager to learn and develop sales skills within the emotional selling concept and value-based selling
	Understand how to evolve a customer’s business based on advanced data analytics
	You are strong in building trust with the customers

This position will be based in Malmö.

What you will accomplish together with us:

	Managing your own portfolio of customers and will be responsible for selling our data analytics solutions to smaller accounts across Europe
	Developing new and existing customers to a higher engagement level with our solutions and build strong customer relationships
	Assessing and analysing customer needs, respond to customer enquiries, offer products and services as appropriate, negotiate and follow until the closing
	Be a force for positive change, growing the business year over year
	Providing administrative support to other Account Managers on larger accounts
	Collaborating and working closely with other sales team members as well as Data Scientists and Project Managers
	Relating technical and business concepts to user needs
	Implementing and participating in targeted marketing activities within the portfolio

What will convince us:

	A bachelor or master’s degree in business, technical and/or life science degree or a degree in another discipline with a solid technical understanding  
	Preferable experience within the Bio process industry or similar
	Some sales experience in an equivalent role
	Experience in negotiation.
	Self-motivated, results oriented and persistent,
	Capacity to work independently with a strong sense of responsibility
	Interpersonal, written and presentation skills and ability to work with all levels within the customers’ and internal organizations.
	Experience working with CRM systems.
	Fluent oral and written communication in English is a requirement, beneficial to speak Swedish or Danish

What we offer 

Sartorius’ ambition is to simplify progress in the bio-pharmaceutical industry to help translate scientific findings into new therapeutics faster and more efficiently. Nearly 10,000 employees at more than 60 sites are working together on achieving our goal: Better health for more people. And together, we have grown strongly over the past years. Enjoy the advantages of working with a global player:  

Opportunity for international career development: a global network offering seminars and training sessions, expert and manager career paths

Open and highly collaborative culture: mutual support within teams and working as equals, team spirit and international collaboration

Strong values: sustainability, openness, enjoyment

Ambitious goals: Sartorius plans to double its sales revenue approximately every five years and expects to grow its global team to approximately 15,000 people in 2025.

We look forward to receiving your application.

www.sartorius.com/career
